title: Add a "AI players" filter to custom games
body:
Title,

I like finding challenges in custom games, it wastes a lot of my time when I enter rooms with players that have 4 bot allies and 5 bot enemies.

Being able to see this filter in custom game lobby will tell me to simply avoid that room.

Rito pls.

replies.body: Ofc it's not possible that they have 4 bot allies and 5 bot enemies since I managed to get in the game, but you get the idea I hope.
